title: 2020 Could Be the Year of the American Worker
itunes:title: 2020 Could Be the Year of the American Worker
description:
Becky Frankiewicz, President at ManpowerGroup, discusses how the balance of power in the U.S. employment market has shifted from employers to skilled workers. She says employers need to think of human beings as talent.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
